sources.title: The golden calf, Part One
sources.description:
Part Two: https://youtu.be/CAT9AQQ4cOw

Based on the novel of the same name by Ilf and Petrov. A fraudster and adventurer, a “great schemer” who knows “four hundred relatively honest ways of taking money” Ostap Bender, decides at all costs to fulfill his crystal childhood dream - to see Rio de Janeiro! Now it's a small matter - you just need to borrow wealth from the underground millionaire Koreiko, who modestly lives on the salary of a simple employee...

IMDb rating: 8.3

Year of production: 1968

Director: Shveitzer Mikhail
Screenwriter: Mikhail Schweitzer
Composer: Firtich Georgiy
Operator: Poluyanov Sergey
Production designer: Freidin Abram

Cast: Gerdt Zinovy, Sergey Yursky, Leonid Kuravlev, Evgeny Evstigneev, Victor Semenov, Evgeny Perov, Pavel Vinnik, Pavel Pavlenko, Nikolay Sergeev, Konstantin Voinov, Svetlana Starikova, Nikolay Boyarsky

sources.description:

metadata.Plot: A crook named Ostap Bender, who survived a murder attempt by Kisa Vorobyaninov in "12 Chairs, " now schemes to extort 1 million from an underground millionaire.
metadata.Writer: Ilya Ilf, Yevgeni Petrov, Mikhail Shvejtser
metadata.Actors: Sergey Yurskiy, Leonid Kuravlyov, Zinoviy Gerdt
